Ready for a treat?

Order

Cinnamon Rolls

Original

The original cinnamon roll is simply irresistible. Boasting a luscious swirl of cinnamon and rich brown sugar nestled within its pillowy layers, this decadent treat will leave you yearning for another bite!

Chocolate Delight

Enrobed in velvety 70% dark chocolate and adorned with delicate almond thins, this pairing brings you the allure of Drumstick ice-cream cones, marking it as one of my cherished and preferred desserts!

Cookies & Cream

Adorned with a luscious sugar glaze and generous chunks of Oreo's, this roll is the ultimate companion to a cup of coffee. If a delightful crunch is what you seek, this is the perfect treat for you!

Specialties

Pizza Rolls

Resembling our classic cinnamon rolls in form, these savory rolls diverge with an infusion of tomato sauce, spices, and green onions. Enjoy them as an afternoon snack or a dinner appetizer!

Black Sesame Soup

A popular Chinese dessert, this aromatic soup delights the senses with its rich, nutty flavor and a distinctive fragrance, making it an extremely comforting treat!
